title: RIOT, your community is screaming out your name, please talk to us.
body:
Your community isn't happy, and they just want to know why.
they are calling for you and you are ignoring them.

Not a single comment on this has received a Red reply, (and theres a lot) and after you hype up the new ranked system so much, and after you reply excitedly to every comment that says 'I'm hyped about ranked coming out', after you release skins commemorating it and a new champion select system for it, it finally comes out, and what the people were looking forward to so much hurts them and they don't know why, and then you stop responding completely to them. They feel like you have abandoned them.

and if i didn't know better id say you had. So just talk to them, show them that you still care for them, explain what is happening.
Tell them why they win 10/10 placements and drop from gold 1 to bronze 1, just tell them. 

You know why obviously, because you wrote the software, and they want to know too. Is that so much to ask?
they don't want to hear it from some cocky player who preaches about MMR and 'getting good' that no-one takes seriously, 
They want to hear it from you.

(and this is just some of the OCE people on the first day or two, i ran out of room for screenshots on my desktop without even finishing the OCE comments, let alone the NA and european servers. You cant just ignore a mass cry like this.)

We don't want much, we just want to know why, can you not even give us that?

replies.body: It is called a RESET. People dont get this, Challengers go from Challenger to Plat 1, they dont complain cause they know its a MMR reset, people need to learn this happens EVERY season.
And every time it happens, the boards are taken over by qq threads.

As has been said already, it's a system reset.

Watch any streamer who is Diamond + and you'll see them only get Plat 1 if they go 10/10.

MMR reset working as intended. 

I don't get why people are so upset about having to, you know, play the game to earn their spot in the ladder. What would be the point of people receiving a new season and just getting starting back to where they were beforehand? If players are good they will get to the spot on the ladder deserving of their skill.
even when riots trying to help out they still manage to screw us over
